name: part_008
file: tmp_【#あくシオ3Dライブ】おうたのはっぴょうかい！【ホロライブ⧸湊あくあ・紫咲シオン】 [_xL58zG9k5k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section where the two talk about the performance and announce a new video.
Announcement of the cover song 'Menhera ja nai mon!'.

subtitles.original: ...言葉にして君を呼ぶよ
subtitles.english: ...Make it into words and call your name

subtitles.original: 波打ち際をもう一度
subtitles.english: The shoreline once more

subtitles.original: もう二度と悲しまずに澄むように
subtitles.english: So that we never have to be sad again

subtitles.original: ハッと息を飲めば 消えちゃいそうな光だ
subtitles.english: If I catch my breath, the light seems like it'll disappear

subtitles.original: きっとまだ 胸に住んでいた
subtitles.english: I'm sure it was still living in my heart

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばせば触れた あったかい未来は
subtitles.english: The warm future I could touch if I reached out

subtitles.original: 密かに二人を見ていた
subtitles.english: Was secretly watching the two of us

subtitles.original: パッと花火が
subtitles.english: The fireworks suddenly...

subtitles.original: (パッと花火が)
subtitles.english: (...suddenly blossomed)

subtitles.original: 夜に咲いた
subtitles.english: Blossomed in the night

subtitles.original: (夜に咲いた)
subtitles.english: (...in the night)

subtitles.original: 夜に咲いて
subtitles.english: Blossoming in the night

subtitles.original: (夜に咲いて)
subtitles.english: (...in the night)

subtitles.original: 静かに消えた
subtitles.english: And quietly disappeared

subtitles.original: (静かに消えた)
subtitles.english: (...quietly disappeared)

subtitles.original: 離れないで
subtitles.english: Don't leave me

subtitles.original: (離れないで)
subtitles.english: (...don't leave me)

subtitles.original: もう少しだけ
subtitles.english: Just a little longer

subtitles.original: (もう少しだけ)
subtitles.english: (...just a little longer)

subtitles.original: もう少しだけこのままで
subtitles.english: Just a little longer, like this

subtitles.original: あの日見わたした渚を 今も思い出すんだ
subtitles.english: I still remember the shore we looked out over that day

subtitles.original: 砂の上に刻んだ言葉 君の後ろ姿
subtitles.english: The words carved in the sand, and the sight of your back

subtitles.original: パッと光り咲いた 花火を見ていた
subtitles.english: We were watching the fireworks that suddenly lit up and bloomed

subtitles.original: きっとまだ 終わらない夏が
subtitles.english: I'm sure the summer that hasn't ended yet...

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心を 解かして繋いだ
subtitles.english: Melted our ambiguous hearts and connected them

subtitles.original: この夜が続いて欲しかった
subtitles.english: I wanted this night to continue

subtitles.original: 違うんよ、違う！
subtitles.english: It's not like that, no!

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: これだと「イエスフォーリンラブ」になるんよ、違うんだよね。
subtitles.english: If we do this, it becomes "Yes Fall in Love", that's not it.

subtitles.original: 違う、でも、うん、やりたいって言って…
subtitles.english: No, but, yeah, you said you wanted to do it...

subtitles.original: 違ったよね！間違えた！
subtitles.english: That was wrong! We messed up!

subtitles.original: 違うんでしょ、間違えたねちょっと。
subtitles.english: It was wrong, right? We messed up a bit.

subtitles.original: そんなもうさ、ね、いいなんかエモい感じだったのに、なんでそんなことするん、なって。
subtitles.english: That was such a, you know, good emotional feeling, why did you do that?

subtitles.original: でもやりたいって…
subtitles.english: But you said you wanted to...

subtitles.original: あーもう！間違えちゃった！
subtitles.english: Oh come on! I messed up!

subtitles.original: あということでね、えー次が最後の曲になるんですけれども。
subtitles.english: Ah, so, the next one will be the last song.

subtitles.original: 早いね。
subtitles.english: That's fast.

subtitles.original: 早い。なんか時の流れは…
subtitles.english: Fast. Somehow the passage of time is...

subtitles.original: ね、早いですね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's fast, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ちょっとYouTubeも狂っちゃったけどね。
subtitles.english: Even though YouTube went a bit crazy too.

subtitles.original: これ何？この手。上げちゃって。
subtitles.english: What's this? This hand. You've got it up.

subtitles.original: 上げちゃってね。上げとこ。下げ下げ…下げとこね。
subtitles.english: I've got it up. Let's keep it up. Down down... let's lower it.

subtitles.original: ちょっとYouTubeもちょっと狂っちゃったけどね、ま、最後の曲になります。
subtitles.english: Well, YouTube went a bit crazy too, but it's the last song.

subtitles.original: ということで…
subtitles.english: So...

subtitles.original: その前に！
subtitles.english: Before that!

subtitles.original: なに？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: すごいあるでしょ、言うことが！
subtitles.english: There's something big to say, right!

subtitles.original: ん？なに？すごい告知？
subtitles.english: Hm? What? A big announcement?

subtitles.original: すごい奴よ！言うも！
subtitles.english: A big one! Let's say it!

subtitles.original: いっちゃう？
subtitles.english: Should we?

subtitles.original: 言わないと。そうだよな。
subtitles.english: We have to. That's right.

subtitles.original: すごいのは先に言っとかんと。
subtitles.english: Gotta say the big thing first.

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: じゃ、せーのでバンって出るから。
subtitles.english: Okay, it'll pop up on 'one, two'.

subtitles.original: おっけー。いくよ。いくよ。
subtitles.english: Okay. Here we go. Here we go.

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: 動画が！
subtitles.english: A video!

subtitles.original: 上がります！
subtitles.english: Will be uploaded!

subtitles.original: わーー！出るかな？出るわ。
subtitles.english: Waaaa! Will it come out? It will.

subtitles.original: メンヘラじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: I'm not a Menhera!

subtitles.original: ぴえん！
subtitles.english: Pien!

subtitles.original: ということでね、えーと、このあと22時に、えープレミア公開で、
subtitles.english: So, after this at 22:00, as a premiere,

subtitles.original: わたくしのあくあちゃんねるのYouTubeで、えーと、
subtitles.english: on my Aqua channel YouTube,

subtitles.original: 「メンヘラじゃないもん！」歌ってみたの動画が上がります！
subtitles.english: a "I'm not a Menhera!" cover video will be uploaded!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yeeey!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛いね、イラスト！
subtitles.english: The illustration is super cute!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛いのこれ。ちなみにね、MVもめっちゃ可愛いです！
subtitles.english: This is super cute. By the way, the MV is also super cute!
